screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mellel file in Mellel 5
screenshot.caption: MELLEL file open in Mellel 5

description: Mellel comes with various features for composing academic documents, including bibliography tools, helpful outline views, and footnote and endnote management. When you save a document with Mellel, the app creates a MELLEL file to store its contents.
To create a MELLEL file, select File → New... or Open Template (if you want to start from a pre-designed template). Then, compose the document and select File → Save or Save As... .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .mellel file in Mellel 5
images.caption: MELLEL file open in Mellel 5
